titleStmt.title: The art of iugling or legerdemaine Wherein is deciphered, all the conueyances of legerdemaine and iugling, how they are effected, and wherein they chiefly consist. Cautions to beware of cheating at cardes and dice. The detection of the beggerly art of alcumistry. And, the foppery of foolish cousoning charmes. All tending to mirth and recreation, especially for those that desire to haue the insight and priuate practise thereof. By S.R.
titleStmt.author: Rid, Samuel.
Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592, attributed name.

titleStmt.title: The art of iugling or legerdemaine Wherein is deciphered, all the conueyances of legerdemaine and iugling, how they are effected, and wherein they chiefly consist. All tending to mirth and recreation, especially for those that desire to haue the insight and priuate practise thereof. By S.R.

notesStmt.note: Often wrongly ascribed to Robert Greene--Folger Shakespeare Library catalog.
